title: Rm Tutor 3
description:
Rm tutor 3. just download, unrar, and open v1.20.0.0, and setup and install.


RM TutorÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ allows teachers/tutors to monitor, demonstrate and control a number of students&#039; PCs simultaneously within the classroom. It gives the teacher/tutor greater control of what is occurring during a class, whilst also updating you on students&#039; progress. RM Tutor is included with all new Community Connect 3ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢/RM Smart-ToolsÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ networks and can be purchased as an option for existing Community Connect 3, RM Smart-Tools 3 or RM SchoolShare networks. 

RM TutorÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ 3 powered by NetSupportÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® is our latest version of this essential tool. It has a fresh, new look and some great new tools added in response to feedback from schools and colleges like yours. In this version of RM Tutor we&#039;ve focused on giving even more power to teachers to tailor the learning environment to your needs.

With screen capture and record functions you can record student behaviour; either to prove ICT proficiency or misuse of school resources. You can also record your own screen so you can perform a demonstration once and use it with other classes or allow students access if they need a quick reminder. 
And now you can choose which students you wish to monitor from any location in your school or with RM Tutor 3 Location Link, our free download, automatically monitor the students in your location giving you more flexibility over who and where you teach.
